root.title: NO quak damag AT chuquicamata mine spokesman
root.body: the earthquak hit northern chile today regist 7.0 open-end richter scale caus damag copper mine chuquicamata mine spokesman say chuquicamata public relat director guillermo barcelo told reuter telephon mine quak caus problem oper continu usual A spokesman state chilean copper commiss santiago confirm damag chuquicamata
